fields.name: Mo Salam
fields.bio_body:
A serial Entrepreneur with engineering as well as business background who managed and consulted more than 15 Start-up’s in the tech industry for the last 10 years.He is driven by a strong passion for technology-empowered by entrepreneurial skills and therefore worked with various technologies such as (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Java , Angular JS, PHP,JSON,XML,Git, AWS, WordPress, Heroku, DigitalOcean, Linux, CLI, Django, OpenCV,…)
For more on the projects he has worked on check out the Projects page
In business he has raised sales above 6.6+ Million RM (1.6+ M USD) in less than a year through inbound marketing techniques, gained as a chief operations officer at YouSocial a profit margin of 60% and raised 166 K USD in seed funding for 2 of his Start-up’s in the past 2 years.
Combining both business and engineering aspects sets him to become the Full Stack Entrepreneur he aspires.
Because it is really important to know the WHAT and the WHY to master the HOW. It’s all about Coding with a goal in mind.

fields.title: Web Development
fields.description:
Backend: Python, Django, Django RestFramework, Java, Spring boot </br>
frontend : HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js

fields.title: Growth
fields.description: Digital Marketing, Business Modeling Strategy, and more

fields.body: Mo is the best in bed

fields.subject: Bachelor of Business Administration - BBA
fields.overview: Business administration is administration of a business. It includes all aspects of overseeing and supervising business operations, as well as related fields which include accounting, finance, project management and marketing.

fields.subject: Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering
fields.overview: I have studied 4 years in Engineering, have got a lot of knowledge, and open up my mind to the potential of technology and what actually I want to be. so I am glad I had this experience.

Chosen as Microsoft Student Partner Representative and nominated to be MSP following year.
attended many training workshops such as :

- Innovation Warm-Up Event – Microsoft Egypt
- Adventure | Citizenship Warm-up – Microsoft Egypt

Leading the Technology and Development Team in Accsellerate SDN BHD, part of Commerce.Asia group, to build a leading end to end SaaS solution for Business to manage all their business operations from accounting, sales, hr, and operations and introducing them to new opportunities inside a rich ecosystem enabled by our partners in commerce.asia.
